content.detailedDescription: My husband and i came home from the library. we had gotten out of the car and while standing there, i happened to look up and saw an orange light overhead that i thought was a plane. it went north in a straight line for about 5 seconds, then just vanished. i checked online a couple of days later to see if anyone else may have reported it, to see if there was an explanation for it, but i didn't find anything. i don't know what it was. i guess i thought it was a plane because it seemed like it had lights to the sides at first, but when i looked at it more, it looked more like one big light, kind of like a plane. then it just disappeared, which i thought was really strange.
content.summary: I saw an orange light, thought it was a plane. it went north for app. 5 seconds, then just vanished.

content.detailedDescription: At or about 1838 hours. i arrived at home from work at jblm, wa. it was a beautiful stary night so i looked up at the stars and noticed a brief flash in the sky at about 85 degrees above the horiazon. i searched the sky for a follow on flash as i thought it could have been a metor falling star event.  it was then i noticed a star like object moving slowly south of the flash at or about the same unknow altituted, very high but clearly below the stars.  this lasted a bout 3 mins.  i stayed in the front yard at my home on cooper pt rd olympia, wa for several more mins observeing the big dipper and othe other stars, but nothing more to report.
content.summary: At or about 1838 hours, o a stary clear night. observed a star like flash 85' abh.  south of flash saw a star like object move slowly to south until no longer seen; about 3 mins in duration.  i had just arrived at home after work.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was heading to work my mother saw  it first i was in the back seat of the car and she told me to look out side that she had seen some lights, so i did and as soon as i looked i was so shocked it was like a hypnotizing type of experience as if i couldn't keep my eyes off of it i instantly grabbed my phone and began to record it. there were 6 sphere orange gold color like it was not too bright but the light i can describe it as a dim color it didn't hurt my eyes by looking at it. from where i was in the car i could see it close and they moved when the front sphere shaped moved it was as if they followed the pattern...I was shocked but i knew that it's something that one shouldn't be surprised to see we are not the only ones in this infinite universe i just didn't think i would finally see that so close and clear and for me to record that it's a plus but since we was in the highway and me heading to work i lost sight of it i wish i could of at least get more footage or eye sighting of it but that one minute has definitely change my life in a positive way that was an amazing beautiful experience
content.summary: The light was like a orange gold color it was about 6 sphere shaped objects

content.detailedDescription: As posted on facebook
content.summary: Find attached file

content.detailedDescription: I went to lay down in bed and thought i saw the moon rising, but it was so bright and just kept getting brighter. it started to move up and down, then side to side. sparkling and disappearing at times. i was frozen watching it. then it looked like a sparkling alien shaped face. i wanted to go outside but it didn't feel right. then i thought to try and take photos and videos, but my camera on my phone started to pixelate and i couldn't see it through the camera but could still see it with my eyes. the computer in the living room started making strange sounds; then i had a massive headache. the dogs are still barking, but i no longer can see anything and i'm not going outside to see if it's still there. i feel uneasy about it. i always thought if i thought they were going to come get be i would really like that. but not whatever that was. my head no longer hurts and i think it might be gone unless the dogs can sense something i no longer can. it first appeared through the trees and it disappeared the same way.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I thought the moon was coming up but then it started moving all around and disappearing at times. moved fast and slow then looked like a face. made my head hurt really bad. tried to take video couldbt see with cam but with eyes. phone was pixelating. comp

content.detailedDescription:
Christmas eve morning at 3:45am i took my trash outside then i wheeled the container to the curb. we were forecasted to have snow christmas night. i had read that the last full mon o christmas happened in 1977, so i stopped next to my van in my driveway and simply held up my phone to take a few photos of the almost full moon, since we weren't going to be able to see the christmas full moon. i centered the frame and click, click, click. then i went back inside and sat down on the couch, & when i opened the photos i just took, i noticed a small blue dot, below right, then higher right, then much higher also on the right side of the moon. i could not see this when i took the photos. then i enlarged all the pictures, and the blue dot was indeed there! i was like, whoa, what is that? holy crap! i just took photos of a ufo!
do i need to submit the enlargements of these photos, or can you enlarge them?
content.summary: Took 3 back to back pics of the almost full moon from my driveway 3-4 seconds tops

content.detailedDescription:
Christmas eve morning at 3:45am i took my trash outside then i wheeled the container to the curb. we were forecasted to have snow christmas night. i had read that the last full mon o christmas happened in 1977, so i stopped next to my van in my driveway and simply held up my phone to take a few photos of the almost full moon, since we weren't going to be able to see the christmas full moon. i centered the frame and click, click, click. then i went back inside and sat down on the couch, & when i opened the photos i just took, i noticed a small blue dot, below right, then higher right, then much higher also on the right side of the moon. i could not see this when i took the photos. then i enlarged all the pictures, and the blue dot was indeed there! i was like, whoa, what is that? holy crap! i just took photos of a ufo!
do i need to submit the enlargements of these photos, or can you enlarge them?
content.summary: Took 3 back to back pics of the almost full moon from my driveway 3-4 seconds tops

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work, when an object appeared in the sky. it was approximately 6:42 am.  i looked at my clock. i always enjoy watching the sunrise in the morning over the sands and look at the sky often. i thought the object was a blimp or a helicopter at first. the object didn't move. i pulled into the parking lot at my office.  i looked up in the sky and it was still there.  i looked closer and could not determine the craft.  i worked as a civilian contractor for the air force for 12 years and am familiar with all types of air craft. i noticed this object did not have lights.  there seemed to be an aura sounding it. it looked like a rectangle at first.  then it started to resemble a donut. it was really indescribable. i was in a state of amazement and awe.  then i though i should take some pictures. so, i pulled out my phone and started taking pictures.  i accidentally took a couple of videos too. i observed the object and took photos for 20 minutes. my first photo was at 0646 hrs and my last photo was at 0706 hrs.   then all of a sudden the object disappeared.  i wish that i had a real camera to record the event.
content.summary: Saw an object appear in the northeast. it hovered for approximately 20 minutes. it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
December 25, 2015 christmas day-evening 
between 22:00 edt and 23:00 edt 
while driving with my 5 year old son and my girlfriend. we were on our way home from dropping my girlfriend's father off after christmas festivities. we were heading south on inkster rd. almost into the city of inkster from the redford area. i looked up and noticed a glowing light almost like that of an airplane most of us are used to seeing on this route as we are in the vicinity of detroit metro airport (dtw). but there was something different about this light as it was a bit bigger than airplane landing lights. before i could say anything to my girlfriend she was already fixed on the object and started to tell me about it...I watched in disbelief ready for a tell-tale airplane signature like the blinking tail lights or wings...Nothing. instead to my shock and sanity disbelief the object made a western sudden almost instant turn and changed it's shape like an elongated bullet metalic with white glow and definite blue streak and seemed to be crashing into the airport...I frantically awaited a concusion or impact due to my former military training but nothing happened...It seemed to disappear so my best guess is that it was pretty far away and that it made incredible speed towards our western horizon. i'm not 1 to make things up nor believe in b.S. but i swear on my 1st born this happened!
content.summary: White blue streaked orb changed direction and shape

content.detailedDescription:
Found what appeared to be a star on the picture of the late eclipsed moon, when enlarged it looked like a craft taking off from a hovering/stationary position leaving a plasma trail. does not look like a shooting star/meteorite.  it was not noticeable to my naked eye.
i was on the back steps of my residence, using a dell venue 7 tablet to take this picture.
content.summary: Found on enlarged picture of late september eclipse of the moon on sept. 28, 2015, appears to be craft leaving a stationary position, making plasma trail

content.detailedDescription:
Christmas night just after dark my parents were leaving with my brother. my brother walked out first and saw the 5 orbs form the pyramid or triangle shape.  he yelled for us and as i got to the door i saw them leave it and form a straight line vertical to the horizon..They moved so fast it was unbelievable in ways i've seen no aircraft do. then 3 just simply vanished.. by then i was getting my phone camera out. i think we were just all in such shock it took a minute. i took a couple of photos as they took off at lightening fast speed straight off. i took a couple of snapshots and some 4k video that is way to big to upload. not the greatest video because i didn't start it until late in. my 7 kids (21,18,16,13,10,7,and 4), my dad, my brother and i were all talking about the whole darn that hung and my kids were so excited i had to tell them to cut it out. so that we could see if there was any sound, but it was silent except for the passing trucks at the 123 bypass a few miles away. on a still night like that we can hear a helicopter for many many miles but these didn't move or look, or even sound anything like one of those. we see those around a lot so we do know what that would look like even a at night. i'll be glad to pass it on the 4k video the file is huge though and i only got the tail end with 2 of them. when i zoomed in on the one it looked triangular and flashed white and red it seemed. the clouds that night were everywhere. it was by happenstance that it was open long enough to see it. 

later in that same evening when amother brief window opened my brother called me (they live about 22 miles from us)and asked me if i could go out and see any light since he was seeing something very odd anything his house. another light behind the clouds brighter than  the moon in that same vacinity, and some odd green strowning was all i saw before the clouds moved back to fully block anything at all. sorry if this runs on it is late and i'm only reporting it because my brother said i should do it. i did try to upload the video but it is to large for my phone to handle uploading apparently!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Walked literally out of my front door to 5 glowing and flashing triangular objects leaving a pyramid formation

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend were in a car, about to turn into the apartment complex parking lot, when i noticed a bright orangey-red star-like light in the sky. at first i assumed it was a plane due to how bright the light was, but it was unmoving, pulsating, and the orange color didn't look like the typical red and green seen on everyday aircraft/drones.

as we continued to drive into the parking lot, i kept watching it. the light began to move slowly, across the sky towards us. i told my friend to stop the car, and we watched it carefully. we were both confused as to what it was because it didn't really seem like a plane or drone (despite us living near a small airport). 

it finally reached a spot almost literally right above us underneath some clouds that were illuminated by nearby city lights, and both of us saw a distinct round/disc shaped object. the light we saw was actually rotating around the edge of the disk shape. the object continued to move behind us and was eventually obstructed by the treeline. the object moved no faster than 10mph, and was completely silent.

having witnessed odd lights in the sky before, and just chalking it up to drones or satellites, this was the first time i'd ever seen something that distinct, and the fact my friend saw it as well reassured me i wasn't coming to an entirely wrong conclusion. neither of us felt particularly scared or alarmed, it was a very confusing, almost awestruck sort of experience.
content.summary: Disc like object with a rotating/pulsating orange-red light hovered over the trees, then moved past the horizon line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to my mini van in my driveway to go pick up my girlfriend from work when i saw three incredibly bright lights moving towards my direction. lights were moving parallel to highway 31 from the north towards the south. object was moving so slow and lights were so bright it made me stop instantly in my tracks.Could not see the body of the craft but could tell it was large and was curious of how it was moving so slow without falling.

the three bright lights/object were heading behind the roof tops of the homes to my left so i went and got into the van, pointing north, waiting for it to reappear on my side of roof tops. well, that took a tiny bit longer then expected, it either slowed down more or stopped for a brief second but finally crossed over the roof tops back into view. 

once the object was in my sight again i could start to see the bottom of the object and it started making a banked turn..... yes banked. looking at the bottom of the object was a complete surprise, it was totally lit up with multiple large bright lights, and i could see a perfect triangular outline of the object. i will try to attach some drawings with this report, if they scan properly. funny thing is while coming at me i saw no outline at all. color of the large lights were incredibly bright white and the smaller ones were incredibly bright red.

now the object is moving west, slightly southwest, pretty much at the same pace as it was originally, which was still very slow. looking at it from behind it had a rectangular shape, to guess, i would go with around 15-20 feet thick. there was two lit up areas in red that were rectangular in shape to the right and left of the center rear end of object. craft continued off to the west actually towards my girlfriends work, which made me snap out of it, jumped in the van and followed it towards her job till it went out of sight beyond the skyline. someone else had to see this thing fly over our town, i had yet stopped to ask an officer if there was any reports, or mentioned myself. crazy thing is my phone was laying on center arm of van and i never thought to grab it for a video, was kinda froze and amazed. takes lousy videos anyhow, like most others you see but it definitely would have caught lights on the bottom.

everything about that craft looked from out of this world, my question to myself was the banked turn?? that did come across to me as man made. moving so slow anything man made would have fell out of the sky and made some kind of sound. the lights were so huge the weight alone if man made would have taken incredible power to lift causing sound (plus its just the way they appeared). drones that may not make noise could not carry that weight, plus there was a solid dark surface that was strange, darker then the night sky around object. have not seen or heard any other reports of this since it happened, would appreciate if anyone else seen this? to say something to what they may have seen. another thing most man made lights cast a beam, like a deer spotlight, these did not and they were huge and bright. thanks for your time. this is my second sighting in this area, or ever, first one in august and yes other people i met around here have been seeing unexplained lights in the sky themselves.
content.summary: Three  incredibly  bright lights moning from north to south, when it got close enough the whole bottom was lit up in a triangular  shape, turned moved off to the west.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a aircraft technician
in one night in autumn 2012 about 22:00 in iran shiraz airport me and airport security saw two dot light which move with unbelievable speed in opposite direction of airport runway and change position together a bout 1000 feet altitude and ulterior of runway they travel length of runway and then shutdown
content.summary: Two little light dots with unbelievable speed and change position together

content.detailedDescription: We were driving, then in our driveway, watching it, trying to get a picture, but it was too far away. we noticed because of the bright red-orange color. it pulsed, moved a bit, then vanished. we at first thought it might be a planet, or an aircraft, but it wasn't. it clearly stayed stationary at first, but then wavered, then moved irregularly toward the west, but rotated in a small circle, then disappeared. we were at first incredulous, and then hopeful. it definitely was not anything we have seen before, nor did it seem to be a planet or star.
content.summary: While driving home at 8 p.M., we saw a pulsing red-orange light that we at first thought might be mars. we watched it as we drove, and when we arrived home, it was still in the sky, but was moving. i wavered, moved in different directions/disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
From my driveway, looking northeast above south mountain, i observed a flying object that did not look at all like a commercial airliner. it was 1-2 miles away, headed slowly northeast. the reddish-orange lights ran completely across the midsection, and pulsated. i quickly took pictures with my smartphone camera, and tried to get a video, but streetlight came on, which made video impossible. 
i was returning from the store and happened to look in the sky, and noticed immediately that this didn't look like a "normal" aircraft. 
my first thought was "not a normal plane, get a picture". 
given the proximity to airforce bases and previous unidentified aircraft around phoenix, i thought it might be some new experimental craft, or maybe one not of this planet. 
my feeling was "hey, i'm really seeing this, and it isn't spooky or overly exciting -- this is a real craft of some type". no emotion swings, just logical realization that i'm seeing something outside my frame of reference. 
i lost sight of it when it was 5+ miles away, and was too small to see in the dark night sky.
content.summary: Classic saucer shaped craft, dark exterior with pulsating red-orange lights across the midsection.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
L was about 8/9 yrs old and my parents had friends over ,, as they ( friends) were leaving our home about 9pm i'm guessing, l was laying on the trunk of the car, and my brother on the front lawn and saw a dull grey triangular  object ( ufo ) in the sky, seemed to be about 300 ft in the air seemed like you could hit it with a slingshot,, what we had as kids in the 70s, it had lights and you could make out define corners i kinda remember seeing a window with someone/thing looking out, it made no noise as it flew over  i'm guessing south southwest,, if looking at the house from the front it moved to the left,, and never thought much of it ,, and it was about 30 years later i was watching a ufo documentary and when it showed the object that looked like what i saw as a kid it registered in my head that i seen this before, as i brought this to my older brothers attention, as i was telling him what i seen as a kid ,, before i could finish what i was saying, my brother said to me " your talking about the ufo that flew over the house" it gave me the chills,, and has been bothering me ever since, because my brother corroborated what i seen ..,, and another occasion me my younger brother his wife and my sister, were up on his roof watching fireworks on the forth of july,, think it was 2009??,, and my sister seen a cigar shape ufo to the north of same address in culver city, and it was glowing like a cream/light yellow color, we told my sister in law to take pictures of it on her phone and she did,, after the fireworks and we went back in the house , i asked to see the pictures that were taken and everything came out on the photos except the cigar shape object,,, it did not photograph,,,, and those are my stories,,, as to my knowledge and i'm being as accurate and truthful as i can,,,, please let me know if anyone reported these incidents  
                                      thank you , , , john w.
content.summary: Passed over house ,had shape.Door windows lights and made no noise

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting by my pool on a summer night.I was alone saw something move in the sky. looked up and a object came towards me. there was no sound!! like it was floting.Now i see it looks like a saucer and it overs over me. i become very frightened and run into my house.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sitting by my pool saw light looked up and craft slowly came towards me. no noise at all .Then it stopped right above me. got scared and ran into my house.

content.detailedDescription: In 1988 my brother and i were camping up on a hill in metamora indiana on our fathers property. we were watching monday night football on a portable battery powered television. the reception began to go in and out several times during the game keeping us busy moving the antenna around to get reception, when we noticed a dim glowing object in the sky straight above us moving in strange directions. the light made sudden stops and turned at sharp angles in the sky. we watched it for about two minutes before it shot out of the night sky. the next day my brother and i went squirrel hunting and returned to camp afternoon and before packing up i took a picture of my brother standing in our camp. not until the film was developed sometime later, that we noticed the object in the sky above our camp. there was no noise coming from the object, we had heard planes fly over earlier while hunting because sound carries well on top of that hill. my brother and i had a hard time believing what we saw that night above our camp, my brother had not been out of the air force very long and said that he knew of no such plane that could maneuver like that. we only now after some twenty seven years have decided to share this because at the time this happened people looked at you like your a nut or liar. we are not looking for attention here, but would like a honest opinion of what we encountered.
content.summary: My brother and i were on a camping/ hunting trip october 3rd 1988  when that night we saw a dim glowing object in the night sky moving at various speeds and stopping and turning  at 90 degree angles. the next day we took a picture of our campsite

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home with my cousin we stopped at the stop light looked up to the left in the sky by a sign a object suddenly appeared at amazing speed it look as if it was going to hit the sign but as soon as it appeared it was gone like it came from a portal or accidentally turned of the cloaking device
content.summary: I was driving and it seemed as if it shot into the sky by accident then suddenly disappeared

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: June 6 th 2010 i was in backyard moon directly above my house i look up at moon when i see four ufo's flying in and out of each other and the. they stop and hover so i turn and look to the north when i see a missle with plasma flames i could tell kit would bounce and make a faint rumbleing noise it trerjectery was the setting sun next day japan had a solar flare i believe this is why we have a hole in the sun today my reaction was i called my family members out to see they did not believe me and that was upsetting  i lost sight of the object because the sun was so bright  and trees in way of view i believe the ufo's were trying to distract me so i turned and the missle flew by i was standing in my backyard when it all happened . i always look into the sky like i always do
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo's where directly above my house.Plasma missle came from the east heading west hitting the sun causing hole you can see today in sun no sound from misslej japan has solar flare next day june 7 th

content.detailedDescription: I was driving and i sow some lights between the trees. i thought they were some kind of christmas lights though pretty big for that. as the car moved i realized there were more of them and when i turn the curb it was clear that they were in the middle of the sky  but  it was overcast and they appear and desappear probably due to the moving clouds. three of the lights were smaller or were higher and were separate from the rest of the group formed by around seven lights. this group keep a constellation kind of shape. i stop the car to see if they were making any noise like a helicopter but there was total silence. they stay like that for a few minutes. i was trying to take a picture with my cell phone but the streets lights were too bright and nothing came out. then, some of the lights starting to move, two of them may have fussed but i am not sure. them they disappear probably they went higher than the clouds.
content.summary: Aroun 10 lights like christmas lights forming a constelation like patter. no sound

content.detailedDescription: Arriving home exiting my truck my wife and i observed a orange orb stationary at a low altitude. it suddenly accelerated over flying our home at a low altitude noisless except a swish of cutting thru  air.  it went past and went up thru low cloud bank . a minute later a secound orb same  description   appeared on south horizon and also overfly our home and traveled in same fashion and direction . followed by a third, appearance was like a chinese lantern  glowing orange . orb in shape low and fast . horizon to horizon is approx 1 minute. traveling  on a heading of 350 degrees. no navagation lights no motor noise. i am a retired law enforcement of 23 years and a employee of american airlines for 12 years,  i know aircraft military and civilian this was not either ,
content.summary: 3 orange orbs overfly my home

content.detailedDescription: Me my brother in law my uncle were huntingon the pearl river in louisianaright before daylightwe were fixing to get in the boat and cross the riverwhen we looked up and scene a round stainless steel looking object with lights on the bottom white lights my brother in law wanted to shoot at it with a shotgun but we said no as we started to cross the river in the boat when we got to the other side it was already daylight in an hour had passed it only takes about 5 minutes to cross the river it was definitely a loss of time then the object. higher and higher until it slowly disappeared i was about 13 or 14 years old
content.summary: Me my brother in law and my uncle were hunting we looked up and saw the objectabove the river

content.detailedDescription:
We were on the public wharf north side of petty harbor nl. we were a group of teenagers just listening to music and hanging out.  my attention was drawn to the sky at which time i noticed a bright light traveling west to east,  faster than an aircraft would travel.  it was not on the normal flight paths of aircraft which frequently passed over our town enroute east across the atlantic.  i initially thought it was a satellite.  it travelled in a straight  path,  faster than an aircraft.  it looked like a star but was obviously within our atmosphere.    when it reached due east of our position it suddenly flashed and shot off at tremendous speed,  it looked as if it travelled into space at a 90 degree angle from its original path, not toward earth as a shooting star or meteor appears.  immediately my close friend said "did you see that!"  i did not realize he was also watching the object.  we discussed what it could be for a few minutes then passed it off as something explainable.  

recently my old friend and i met over the holidays and after 25 years we both vividly recalled the incident.   i decided it was time to report it to mufon.
content.summary: Bright light witnessed traveling west to east then it glowed brighter and shot off out of sight.
content.locationName: Petty Harbour-Maddox Cove, Newfoundland and Lab

content.detailedDescription: The first time was at night. i was going fishing with my dad. we stop at kettleman city because he was getting sleep. he stop in a parking lot and he got in the back seat and lay down. i was in the front seat and then a very very bright light came on and the heat of the light. that's was it. i don't know how long it last it. because my dad got up and said he was ready to go. another time i was working at night and i was about 20 miles south of corcoran i look up looking north and when i look up i saw this round shining thing it last about 10minutes and then it took off so fast.
content.summary: Very very bright lights over the car at night, and another time at day light cuz the sun was still high.

content.detailedDescription: I pulled in my in laws driveway. got out of my truck and looked down the hill in the rear of the house. coming up the hill, about a 1/4 mile was a round saucer coming up the hill straight to me. i ran inside the house and got my wife and her parents. we all came out into the drive way. by that time the saucer shaped what ever was all most up to the yard. once it cleared the fence it stopped just above the trees. their where no leaves on the trees, so we had a clear view. all 4 of use where looking up at a sharp angle. i was excited and was repeating what is that. the others just stood and looked up and before it left my wife and her mother went back in the house like it was nothing. my father in law was laughing at me! i said " red what was that". and this moron said it was a helicopter. a helicopter? it made no sound. the yard was about 2 acres and the saucer covered more than half. not the first leave was disturbed . i served in the army and worked offshore, i have been around helicopters. one that big and you could not hear yourself scream ! it was a quintessential, flying saucer. with the lights rotating. it never made a sound. this was in the late 80s.I'm the only one that remembers seeing anything. my ex wife and her mother remember me being excited, but don't remember seeing anything. this has bothered me for years, but now i'm 65+ nothing   bothers me now.
content.summary: Observed comming up a hill hovered turned slowly moved w

content.detailedDescription: 1.Shooting off fireworks with 4 year old son. glanced up at moon and realized that there were two.I had no idea what was going on.The object moved horizontally north to south across the hill.My son and i watched for about 25 min. until it passed behind trees.
content.summary: Exact copy of near full moon except it moved north to south watched until it vanished behind trees

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling home after some shopping and i noticed something out of the corner of my eye and brought it to my husband's attention. it appeared to be mimicking our actions as we slowed and stopped at traffic signals.It looked to be a block over from the road we were on so we tried to get closer by pulling in behind a bar.The object stopped over a house and a tree directly in front of us, like it was following us, where we pulled in to try to get closer and we both seemed to sit and stare at each other. the object had multiple colors of lights that seem to rotate and flash around the object. we both knew we were looking at a ufo, as nothing could do this, the body of the craft seemed to almost blend into the dusk/dark sky and especially as there was absolutely no sound coming from the object. we wondered why no one else seemed to notice the object. i don't know how long we sat and examined each other but eventually the lights stopped flashing and rotating and went completely black they came back on and remained solid,after what seemed to be only a minute. i was afraid of what was going to happen next, then the object elevated above the house and tree even further and began moving back to the west in the direction we had originally come from. we followed for probably about a half mile before it shot off,at a speed that no one could follow, into the sky.
content.summary: Object appeared to be watching us as we watched it once it was noticed traveling parallel to us.

content.detailedDescription:
1. in city of poplar bluff missouri.
2. looking up since it was spotted by many many people.
3. a ufo
4. the ufo hovered above the city starting about 12 o'clock and was just stable, the local radio station kwoc reported the siteing and it was observed by hundreds of people, some using telescopes, the airforce was called and the nearest jet field was memphis so they sent a jet to observe the disc, the pilot went up to his maximun altitude which i would guess was bout 30,000 feet. during that period i don't know what kind it was but would guess it was a lockheed f-80, the pilot stated that it was still that much higher above him. the disc stood motionless all afternoon and was still there at sunset as the city went dark and the sun had gone down you could see the sun light reflecting on the bottom of the disc. 
5.Sometime during the night the disc disappeared.

6. there was very likely 1000+ observers since it was on the radio all afternoon.

7. the actual date (1950-1952)was not recorded by me and one friend that used a telescope has passed away long ago, ( my first flight instructor)
content.summary: Ufo hovered obove city for about ten hours
